cardName: Luminara, Queen of the Radiant Suns
prompt: Full art image of Luminara, Queen of the Radiant Suns from Celestial Empires, depicted as a celestial monarch with an aura of bright, radiating light. She stands tall on a throne made of shimmering star material, surrounded by orbiting miniature suns. Her royal attire is a blend of futuristic armor and flowing, ethereal robes that sparkle like the stars. Behind her, a backdrop of a vibrant nebula and distant galaxies adds to the sense of grandeur and cosmic power.
